## Validator.withFormattedError() method

Creates a new [in-place validator](./ts-utils.validation.validator.md) which is derived from this one but which returns an error message supplied by the provided formatter if an error occurs.

**Signature:**

```typescript
withFormattedError(formatter: ValidationErrorFormatter<TC>): Validator<T, TC>;
```

formatter


</td><td>

[ValidationErrorFormatter](./ts-utils.validation.validationerrorformatter.md)<!-- -->&lt;TC&gt;


</td><td>

The error message formatter to be applied.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[Validator](./ts-utils.validator.md)<!-- -->&lt;T, TC&gt;

A new [Validator](./ts-utils.validation.validator.md)<!-- -->.
